casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 26, 2014

[Cite as 02/2612014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-676.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0290. In re D.P.

Hamilton App. Nos. C-130293 and C-130298, 2014-Ohio-467. This cause is pending before the court as a jurisdictional appeal.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals and juvenile court decisions, it is ordered by the court that appellee shall file a response, if any, to the motion for stay no later than 12:00 p.m. on Monday, March 3, 2014.
